=== Meeting information ===
* #xubuntu-devel: Xubuntu Community Meeting, 29 Jul at 10:30 &mdash; 12:13 UTC
* Full logs at <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/xubuntu-devel/2014/xubuntu-devel.2014-07-29-10.30.log.html]]</nowiki>

=== Meeting summary ===

==== Open action items ====
The discussion about "Open action items" started at 10:33.

** xubuntu packageset has been updated with the packages we ship, so uploads should be simpler now
** gstreamer1.0-clutter is the only additional package if we ship parole with a clutter backend
** The "split theme package" bug may subside after the recent QA upload for shimmer-themes but catching duplicates has to be done manually.
** ''ACTION:'' bluesabre to put list of xubuntu packageset packages on wiki
** slickymaster wrote a draft for "things to do after a 12.04 to 14.04 upgrade"

==== Team updates ====
The discussion about "Team updates" started at 10:46.

** new packages in utopic: xfce4-power-manager, xfwm4
** From overwatch on bugs, there has been a small effort to try to treat design decisions as bugs and patch them away
** Such bugs that have attempted to re-open design decision have been flagged as opinion for now
** xfwm4 tabwin needs small theme updates/tweaks, ochosi has local patches for that already

==== Announcements ====
The discussion about "Announcements" started at 10:56.

** Xubuntu 14.04.1 released last week, good job everyone!
** Xfce has made some progress towards new development releases that we will most likely want to pick for 14.10

==== Discussion ====
The discussion about "Discussion" started at 11:01.

* '''Default IRC client''' (11:01)
** ''Vote:'' Drop xchat for Xubuntu 14.10 (Carried)
** ''ACTION:'' ochosi to send mail to ML to vote for dropping xchat for 14.10
* '''Gksu/do''' (11:10)
** ''ACTION:'' knome to check docs side of including pkexec policy files in favor of gksu
* '''Xfce bug bounty program''' (11:20)
** ochosi has helped to set up a bug bounty programme on bountysource.com for Xfce
** ''ACTION:'' marketing team to support xfce's bug bounty programme by informing people on website and social media
* '''Trello and Blueprints''' (11:23)
** ''LINK:'' http://status.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-t/group/topic-t-flavor-xubuntu.html 
** ''ACTION:'' team to continue discussion using Trello, Blueprints
* '''Merged Settings menu in Whisker and classic menu''' (11:53)
** ''LINK:'' https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xubuntu-default-settings/+bug/1310264 
** ''LINK:'' https://i.imgur.com/52N8SmP.png 
** ''LINK:'' https://i.imgur.com/VAbLGmt.png 
** ''LINK:'' https://bazaar.launchpad.net/~xubuntu-dev/xubuntu-default-settings/trunk/view/head:/debian/changelog 
** ''ACTION:'' bluesabre to upload new xubuntu-default-settings
* '''Parole's clutter backend''' (12:02)
** Abiword already pulls clutter, so parole only adds gstreamer1.0-clutter (111 kb)
** With the clutter backend, parole works correctly even in virtualbox
** performance for clutter is less than xv, but better than just X
** ''ACTION:'' bluesabre to enable clutter in parole, set as default in xubuntu-default-settings
* '''Schedule next meeting''' (12:11)
** ''ACTION:'' pleia2 to schedule next meeting
